statements: DELETE FROM grants WHERE organization_name = 'Example Organization';
DELETE FROM grants WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Corp' AND amount < 10000;
DELETE FROM grants WHERE grant_id = 100 OR organization_name = 'XYZ Foundation';
DELETE FROM organizations WHERE org_type = 'Non-Profit' AND org_location = 'USA';
DELETE FROM recipients WHERE organization_id = 1 AND recipient_type = 'Individual';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE grant_id = 2 AND report_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM grant_allocations WHERE allocation_amount > 1000 AND category_id = 3;
DELETE FROM grantors WHERE grantor_name = 'Example Foundation';
